dataModels.angularDescription: Represents an event entity in the Angular app. Used for displaying, creating, and managing events in components such as EventListComponent and EventDetailComponent.
Represents a customer profile in the Angular app. Used for user registration, authentication, and displaying customer information in components like CustomerProfileComponent.
Represents a booking record in the Angular app. Used for managing event reservations, linking customers to events, and displaying booking history in BookingListComponent.
